All Classes

Class Summary 
Class Description
Board
The logic of the game board, handles movements
BoardWindow
The representation of the game window extends JPanel to be able to add to a JFrame
Frame
The class that makes the window of the game extends JFrame to work as a JFrame (window)
Game
Contains the current board and the leaderboard
LeaderBoard
The class that represents the leaderboard which can be saved, loaded, visualized extends AbstractTableModel to be able to pass as a model for a JTable
LeaderBoardRow
Stores data we want to represent from a saved game implements the Serializable interface to be able to serialize
LeaderBoardWindow
The representation of the leaderboard window extends JPanel to be able to add to a JFrame
Main
The Main class of the program Starts the program
MenuWindow
The representation of the menu window extends JPanel to be able to add to a JFrame
NameInputWindow
The representation of the name input dialog window extends JDialog to work as a JDialog (dialog window)
Position
The class that represents a position in the row-column coordinate system
Tests
The class that tests several methods of the program
Tile
The class that represents a Tile
ViewBoardWindow
Shows a screenshot in a dialog window (the Board screenshot) extends JDialog to work as a JDialog (dialog window)
